title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open-WebUI); chat, multi-user, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient CLI wrapper that adds conversation history, prompt templates and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Neovim plugin that brings local Ollama completions into your editor like Copilot.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented Generation stack using Ollama, Chroma and LangChain.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI backend, NextChat UI, model fine-tune, GPU Docker, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama replies into any Discord channel.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot with group whitelist and per-user rate limits.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings and strong typing for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker-gpu
summary: Official GPU-enabled Docker image with CUDA drivers and runtime baked in.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community registry of custom GGUF models optimized for Ollama with Modelfile snippets.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel conversations.

title: ollama-experiments
summary: Research repo comparing quantization strategies, inference speeds and memory use across Ollama backends.
